channel.title: CVE Feed for Openfind -- Mail2000 V7.0
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openfind -- Mail2000 V7.0

item.title: CVE-2024-6740|2024-08-01T21:41:04.575Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v7.0
item.description: Openfind's Mail2000 does not properly validate email atachments, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject JavaScript code within the attachment and perform Stored Cross-site scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-6741|2024-08-01T21:41:04.558Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v7.0
item.description: Openfind's Mail2000 has a vulnerability that allows the HttpOnly flag to be bypassed. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability using specific JavaScript code to obtain the session cookie with the HttpOnly flag enabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-5399|2024-08-01T21:11:12.667Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v7.0
item.description: Openfind Mail2000 does not properly filter parameters of specific API. Remote attackers with administrative privileges can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-6741|2024-07-15T13:54:55.487Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v7.0
item.description: Openfind's Mail2000 has a vulnerability that allows the HttpOnly flag to be bypassed. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability using specific JavaScript code to obtain the session cookie with the HttpOnly flag enabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-5399|2024-06-10T17:37:56.728Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v7.0
item.description: Openfind Mail2000 does not properly filter parameters of specific API. Remote attackers with administrative privileges can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-6741|2024-07-15T08:33:27.299Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v7.0
item.description: Openfind's Mail2000 has a vulnerability that allows the HttpOnly flag to be bypassed. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability using specific JavaScript code to obtain the session cookie with the HttpOnly flag enabled.

item.description: Openfind's Mail2000 does not properly validate email atachments, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject JavaScript code within the attachment and perform Stored Cross-site scripting attacks.
